attributes.action: Ask President Trump to become the 51st state of the United States of America
attributes.additional_details: Starmer and his cronies have allowed the open border policy to continue unchecked. As a result, thousands of illegal immigrants arrive every year on top of the over-stayers. They are mostly supported by state welfare they are a huge drain on resources. Plus, Reeves has introduced higher taxes and restrictions on business resulting in thousands of redundancies. The pursuit of net zero means UK has the highest electricity costs in the developed world. Trump will reverse these destructive policies.
attributes.background: Vote in Parliament for the ultimate power in the UK to be transferred to the American Government and to report to President Trump so he can replace Starmer and his cronies and stop them destroying Britain. Make Britain great Again under President Trump's leadership!

rejection.details: Joining of the United States of America would be a matter for the US Congress to decide, and not something the UK Government or Parliament could unilaterally do.
